operators.name: Create
operators.description: Create an Observable from scratch by means of a function

operators.name: Defer
operators.description: Do not create the Observable until the observer subscribes, and create a fresh Observable for each observer

operators.name: From
operators.description: Convert various other objects and data types into Observables

operators.name: Interval
operators.description: Create an Observable that emits a sequence of integers spaced by a given time interval

operators.name: Just
operators.description: Create an Observable that emits a particular item

operators.name: Range
operators.description: Create an Observable that emits a particular range of sequential integers

operators.name: Repeat
operators.description: Create an Observable that emits a particular item multiple times

operators.name: Timer
operators.description: Create an Observable that emits a particular item after a given delay
